statements: SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, address FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT full_name, gender FROM patient_records WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT patient_id, full_name FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY full_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, medical_history FROM patient_records WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, full_name, gender, address FROM patient_records WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' AND medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT * FROM patient_records ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC, full_name ASC LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT patient_id, full_name FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Female' AND (address LIKE '%Ave%' OR address LIKE '%Street%');
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_records ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT country, count(*) as num_patients FROM patient_records GROUP BY country;
SELECT patient_name, age, country FROM patient_records WHERE age >= 30 AND country = 'USA';
SELECT patient_name, disease, diagnosis_date FROM patient_records pr JOIN medical_history mh ON pr.patient_id = mh.patient_id WHERE mh.disease = 'Diabetes';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_records WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE country = 'USA' AND gender = 'Male';

SELECT patient_name, diagnosis_date, treatment FROM patient_records JOIN medical_history ON patient_records.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE disease = 'COVID-19' ORDER BY diagnosis_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, country FROM patient_records WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY country, age DESC;
SELECT country, COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS total_patients FROM patient_records GROUP BY country HAVING total_patients > 3 ORDER BY total_patients DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_country FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM medical_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_country FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 40;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, trend_date, trend_description FROM patients JOIN health_trends ON patients.patient_id = health_trends.trend_id;
SELECT * FROM medical_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth, contact_number FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth, contact_number FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender='M';
SELECT patient_name, contact_number FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth>'1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, prescription FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM global_health_trends WHERE trend_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_id, full_name, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%COVID%';
SELECT trend_type, trend_value FROM global_trends WHERE country_id = 'xyz123';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT full_name, address FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT patients.full_name, health_stats.height, health_stats.weight FROM patients JOIN health_stats ON patients.patient_id = health_stats.patient_id WHERE height >= 170 AND weight <= 70;
SELECT country_name, continent, trend_type FROM countries JOIN global_trends ON countries.country_id = global_trends.country_id WHERE trend_value > 100 ORDER BY continent, country_name DESC;
